articles.description: Reaction to Thursday's Europa League and Conference League games, plus build-up and news conferences for the weekend's Premier League matches.
articles.title: European reaction: Liverpool stunned, Hammers lose & Villa win

articles.description: Ninety-seven Liverpool fans died as a result of April 1989's Hillsborough disaster. Nottingham Forest fans have been the silent witnesses of the horror that day.
articles.title: Facing disaster - the Forest fans at Hillsborough

articles.description: Bryson DeChambeau shoots seven under par 65 to lead by one from Scottie Scheffler on storm-shortened first day at the 88th Masters.
articles.title: Masters 2024: Bryson DeChambeau leads as Scottie Scheffler and Danny Willett chase

articles.description: Liverpool's 3-0 home defeat to Atalanta in the Europa League was their worst performance under Jurgen Klopp, says former Reds defender Stephen Warnock.
articles.title: 'Worst Liverpool performance under Klopp'

articles.description: The Super Bowl champion, 23, has said he takes "full responsibility" for his role in a high-speed crash.
articles.title: NFL star Rashee Rice surrenders to police in connection with car crash

articles.description: BBC Sport football expert Chris Sutton takes on Franklin star and Leyton Orient fan Daniel Mays to predict the outcome of this weekend's Premier League games.
articles.title: Sutton's Premier League predictions v Franklin star Daniel Mays

articles.description: Bayer Leverkusen score twice in the last 10 minutes to break West Ham's resistance and take the advantage after the first leg of their Europa League quarter-final.
articles.title: Leverkusen strike late to beat stubborn West Ham

articles.description: The ex-American football star was controversially acquitted of double murder of wife and friend in 1995.
articles.title: OJ Simpson, NFL star cleared in ‘trial of the century’, dies aged 76

articles.description: Goals from Ollie Watkins and John McGinn give Aston Villa a narrow first-leg lead over Lille in their Europa Conference League quarter-final as Unai Emery marked his 1,000th game as a manager.
articles.title: Villa narrowly beat Lille in quarter-final first leg

articles.description: BBC Sport profiles Xabi Alonso's Bayer Leverkusen, so often the nearly men of German football, who are on the brink of winning the Bundesliga title for the first time.
articles.title: 'To win the Bundesliga is unthinkable' - Leverkusen on brink of history
